product_name: Big Agnes Picket Mountain 4 Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a single entry and venting window, the Big Agnes Picket Mountain 4 Tent combines plenty of protection, privacy and headroom, all at a price a growing camping family can appreciate. Large single door features 2 closure options: close the mesh panel to enhance ventilation while stopping the bugs, or zip up the polyester layer for privacy and warmth. Ripstop polyester fly and polyester floor feature a waterproof polyurethane coating; seams are sealed with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape. Lightweight DAC aluminum pole system with press fit connectors; plastic clips and sleeves attach tent body to pole frame. Reflective guylines and reflective webbing on tent corners aid nighttime visibility; color-coded webbing and buckles help make setting up easy and straightforward. Footprint (not included) extends the life of your tent floor by helping protect it from abrasive wear and tear. Closeout.
short_description: With a single entry and venting window, the Big Agnes Picket Mountain 4 Tent combines plenty of protection, privacy and headroom, all at a price a growing camping family can appreciate.
